Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Install the bundle com.thalesgroup.orchestra.office.framework.ae.contribution referenced from "Free column 1" in shared/ae.contributions/eclipse/plugins
From the Windows file explorer, create the D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts1 and D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts2 directory
Create an administrator context called "AdminContext" and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator
Unfold the "AdminContext" context in the context viewer
Click on the "Orchestra" category
In the variable viewer, add the FileSystem environment with two directories "D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts1" and "D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts2" to the "ArtefactPath" variable
In the variable viewer, add the path to "ConfdirOrchestraFramework" confdir to the "ConfigurationDirectories" variable
In the variable viewer, add the path to "ConfdirOffice" confdir to the "ConfigurationDirectories" variable
Click on the "File" menu and select "Save"
In the context viewer, right click on the "AdminContext" context and select "Set as current context"
Right on the Orchestra Explorer and select "New" in the contextual menu

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A "New Artefact" dialog box pops up

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Select the "FS: [D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts1,D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts2]" File System environment in the "Environment" combo box
Select "Powerpoint" in the "Type" combo box
Contributed FileSystem environment page for artefact creation
Click on the "Next" button

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A "Filesystem environment parameters for new artefact" page is displayed

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Select "D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts2" in the "Directory" combo box
Fill "Logaical name" textfield with "Slides/OF_Powerpoint"
Contributed connector bundle for artefact creation
Click on the "Next >" button

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The first connector artefact creation page is displayed, showing the label "Office connector artefact creation, page 1 (Slides/OF_Powerpoint)"

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the "Next >" button

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The second connector artefact creation page is displayed, showing the label "Office connector artefact creation, page 2 (Slides/OF_Powerpoint)"

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the "Finish" button

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "Create New Artefact" dialog box disappears. A "Powerpoint" artefact type has been added to the Orchestra Explorer

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Unfold the "Powerpoint" artefact type
From the Windows file explorer, browse directory D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts2\Slides

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts2\Slides directory contains a OF_Powerpoint.ppt file
